post.author: Admin
post.title: Band Booster Newsletter
post.description: Thank you to everyone that came out to the New Parent’s Meeting despite the torrential downpour!&nbs
post.content:
Thank you to everyone that came out to the New Parent’s Meeting despite the torrential downpour! It was great to meet you!

LINKS you need to know:

  • Mr. Vitale’s Website:
  • Band Booster’s Website
  • FaceBookNorth Royalton Band Boosters -- Like Us!!
  • Other Fundraisers: GFS and Smile.Amazon.com (see below)

DATES you need to know:

  • Aug 20 -21 – Easter Seals Drive (see below)
  • Aug 21 – Homeday Parade -- Refer to Mr. Vitale’s website as we near the date
  • Aug 22 – Parent Preview Night – ICE CREAM SOCIAL FUNDRAISER
  • Aug 26 – First Football Game HOME
  • Aug 29 – Band Booster Meeting -- Media Center @7PM
  • Sept 2 – Football Game HOME
  • Sept 3-5 - Air Show (see below)

We Need Volunteers!!!!

We are SHORT volunteers for:

  • CONCESSIONS -- First TWO football games
  • EASTER SEALS – many time slots OPEN
  • AIR SHOW – ALL days
  • SEE BELOW AND CONSIDER VOLUNTEERING – THESE ARE MAJOR FUNDRAISERS FOR THE MARCHING BAND!!
  • CONCESSIONS:We need you to help sell concessions at HOME football games AND Band Fest! The concessions team has a lot of fun and you will get to meet every hungry person in the stadium! Sign up here to volunteer

Contact: Dawn Rembowski: 216-990-0271

Easter Seals:

There are MANY slots still open to help man the truck! Bring your bando with you! Fun time meeting everyone! And don’t forget to donate YOUR cloth items!

Sign up here

Contact: Holly Michalke 216-926-8836

Air Show:

Sign up and spend the day at the Air Show AND raise money for the band! It is a fun day of selling tickets, passing out programs or parking cars. Plenty of breaks and lunch provided. Bring a chair and watch the show! THIS IS ONE OF OUR LARGEST FUNDRAISERS!

Here is the link to our signup form.

Contact: Gary Diehl 440-915-1178

Other Fundrisers:

GFS: If you shop at GFS, remember to mention: North Royalton Band Boosters and Marching Band at checkout. We have an account there and accumulate $$$$ for everything YOU spend!

Smile.Amazon

Are you an Amazon shopper? Set up a SMILE.AMAZON account and a percentage of what you purchase will be added to the North Royalton Band Booster account:

YOU can help North Royalton High School Band Boosters when you shop for back-to-school supplies and many other items that you purchase from Amazon! This link will help you set up your SMILE account!.

Support us when you shop for back-to-school items. #StartWithaSmile at http://smile.amazon.com/ch/34-1817202 and Amazon donates.
